committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation
Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to provide certain authority to reduce erosion within the Cuyahoga Valley National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to implement a program to eliminate erosion from specified lands within the authorized boundaries of the Cuyahoga Valley National Recreation Area in Ohio. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1986 through FY 1989.

titles.title: A bill to provide certain authority to reduce erosion within the Cuyahoga Valley National Recreation Area, and for other purposes.
